page.title: 08New Housing-Robert's Lodge.1
page.content: {A Representative Survey 32/82. { {Q.}How long have you lived here? {A.}1 week, 1yr.2mths., 2yrs., 2yrs.6mths., 3yrs., 3yrs.6mths. {Q.}Where did you live before? {A.}Spittal Hall, Spittal, Newfields, Prior Park, Berwick, Tweedmouth, Etal Manor Flat, Ford, Lilliesteads, Allerdean, Cornhill. {Q.}Why did you move here? {A.}Liked houses.For employment.Better housing.Retired.Liked Berwick.Bigger house.Smaller house.Convenient for work.First home. {Q.}How many people live here? {A.}Homes with children (18). Homes without children (14) {Q.}Do you have a pet? {A.}Homes with - cats (12) - dogs (7) tropical fish - (3) budgerigars - (3).
